name: RawWebImage
desc: A widget which displays and lays out an underlying HTML element in a platform view.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The underlying HTML element to be displayed.

fields.name: debugImageLabel
fields.desc: A debug label explaining the image.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The requested width for this widget.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The requested height for this widget.

fields.name: fit
fields.desc: How the HTML element should be inscribed in the box constraining it.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: How the image should be aligned in the box constraining it.

fields.name: matchTextDirection
fields.desc: Whether or not the alignment of the image should match the text direction.
